meanings.definition: A person who dodges or evades something.
meanings.sent1: The dodgers quickly avoided the rain by running under a shelter.
meanings.sent2: The dodgers skillfully dodged the obstacles in their path.
meanings.sent3: The dodgers playfully dodged each other in a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: She was a master dodger, always finding a way to escape trouble.
meanings.sent5: The dodgers in the game of dodgeball were swift and agile.

meanings.sent1: The Dodgers won the championship last year.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered loudly for the Dodgers at the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The Dodgers' mascot, a friendly bear, entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The Dodgers hit a home run in the final inning to secure the win.
meanings.sent5: The Dodgers' uniforms were blue and white, representing their team colors.

meanings.definition: A type of small handbill or flyer.
meanings.sent1: She picked up a dodgers advertising a local event.
meanings.sent2: The dodgers were handed out to promote the new store opening.
meanings.sent3: The dodgers fluttered in the wind, catching the attention of passersby.
meanings.sent4: He designed a creative dodgers to announce the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent5: The dodgers were colorful and eye-catching, drawing people to read them.
